translations: [细胞] 减数分裂；[遗][细胞] 成熟分裂

sentences.sentence: Abnormality of chromosome behavior occurs from premeiotic mitosis until various stages in meiosis.
sentences.translation: 从减数分裂前有丝分裂到减数分裂的各个阶段，染色体行为都会发生异常。

sentences.sentence: Observe the meiosis on the F1 hybrid of Orychophragmus violaceus.
sentences.translation: 观察二月兰一代杂交种子的细胞分裂。

sentences.sentence: Frequencies of bivalents in the amphidiploids tended to increase obviously in comparison with the expected chromosome pairing model of the meiosis.
sentences.translation: 与期望染色体配对模式相比，双二倍体中二价体出现的频率有明显增大的趋势。
